pages.title: Enchantment Cakes
pages.text: You can create flavored cakes that give you potion effects when eaten. To do this right click on any cake with a $(l)LINGERING$() potion to create a flavored cake.

pages.title: Vanilla Potion Cakes
pages.text: $(li) $(#9194FE) Speed $(li) $(#D430CF) Strength $(li) $(#29FF56) Jump Boost $(li) $(#D430CF) Regeneration $(li) $(#B57D30) Fire Resistance $(li) $(#112B50) Water breathing $(li) $(#4C5257) Invisibility $(li) $(#3D5B91) Night vision
